meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6244.

td.p: Kara Spak, a newspaper reporter from Chicago, Illinois
Jay Rhee, an oncologist from Annapolis, Maryland
Buddy Wright, an operations engineer from Fort Worth, Texas

tr.td: EUROPEAN GEOGRAPHY
THE 2011 EMMYS
MILITARY WIVES
AUTOBIOGRAPHIES
STORAGE
JEOPORTMANTEAU

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Buddy
Jay
Kara
LADS NAMED VLAD
GIVE THE ORDER
(Alex: Next, we'll deal with the classification of organisms in [*]--the taxonomic order.)
THE MAN BOOKER PRIZE
POP CULTURE
2 Vs, PLEASE
ECONOMIST DANCE PARTY
